# Weather Service for AI/LLMs

This directory contains AI-optimized documentation for the Neretva Valley Weather Service.

## Available Documentation Files

### Root Level Files
- `/llms-full.txt` - Complete weather service documentation with detailed examples
- `/llms-medium.txt` - Compressed documentation for medium context windows (8k-16k tokens)
- `/llms-small.txt` - Highly compressed documentation for small context windows (4k-8k tokens)

### Function Documentation
- `/functions/llms.txt` - Core function documentation
- `/functions/llms-small.txt` - Compact function reference

### API Documentation
- `/api/llms.txt` - External API integration details
- `/api/llms-small.txt` - Quick API reference

## Quick Start

The weather service provides real-time weather data for 10 Neretva Valley locations:
- Ploče (coastal)
- Blace (delta)  
- Opuzen (delta)
- Duba (river)
- Kremena (river)
- Komin (delta)
- Krvavac (inland)
- Kula Norinska (inland)
- Vlaka (delta)
- Mlinište (delta)

## Main Functions

- `fetchAllWeatherData(useOpenWeather, apiKey)` - Get weather for all locations
- `fetchNeretvaForecast()` - Get 9-day forecast
- `fetchAllWeatherDataAI()` - AI-optimized version (recommended)

## AI-Optimized Features

- Intelligent caching (10-minute TTL)
- Parallel API calls
- Compact data structures
- Error resilience
- Memory optimization
